name: Monolith (itch) (omarmhmmd)
description:
MONOLITH is an experimental video game that creates a tangible interface between an otherwise digital experience. Through light, sound and color the player is immersed in a world that exists not only on screen but on the table next to them. Using serial connections between Arduino and the Unity game engine a replica model of the game scene is connected to the virtual world of the game, enabling for an augmented reality experience.

Experience light both in the game and in reality. Light them up by exploring the sculptures and their environment, especially the trees. Press Q when you are finished.
